file_content.text: I hear you're looking for me--or someone who fits my description, at least.
Kareena--would you explain that the two-time Supreme Hunter of the Goa-Ato is not intimidated by any Howling Tempest Gang scum?
Think you just did that yourself, Gorro.
Hang on--you're not about to wreck my place again, are you? I'm still filling in blaster holes!
You will have to clean up their blood, but that should be the extent of it.
I doubt it. This one will not put up much of a fight.
It is too bad. I was looking forward to a challenge.
No, this won't be a challenge at all. Not for me.
You're out of your league.
I like your style. It might have been fun to share a drink, but people are watching now, and I have a reputation to maintain.
Care to explain what this is all about?
Why are we fighting?
Every time I eliminate a pirate legend, my rates go up. I like credits--and an audience to watch me work.
I don't belong to any Howling Tempest Gang.
I'm not a pirate.
So--you are afraid to fight me! I hope everyone here is hearing what a coward you turned out to be.
People of the Blaster's Path, watch and see just how easily the Howling Tempest Gang's best and brightest can be disposed of!
You may be seen as a hero on Rodia, but compared to me....
Get over yourself.
Maybe you're a big deal on Rodia, friend, but next to me...?
Get over yourself.
Last chance to back out before you've made a huge mistake, Gorro....
You don't want to fight me.
You have made the mistake--by coming here. Welcome to Rishi!
I'm done with you. [Attack]
You were amusing for a moment at best. Now die.
People of the Blaster's Path--feel free to stick around. This'll be over in a second.
Are you done talking? Can I go ahead and kill you now? Yes? Good.
It's the truth! They don't just kill the crews they rob, they cook them and eat them!
When I kill people, I have the decency to leave their corpses where they fall. These Red Hulls give us all a bad name!
You must be Gorro.
You! The captain of the Red Hulls, in the flesh!
Easy, Gorro... I just cleaned up after your last brawl. Don't do this to me again.
Are you kidding? I've killed traders, soldiers, thieves, even beasts... but never a cannibal. This will be fun.
Who told you that I'm the captain of the Red Hulls?
Everyone's heard of you. And once I've killed you, everyone will hear about me.
Fighting me won't prove anything. I am not this pirate you think I am.
We don't need to fight.
Your aggression is blinding you. I am not the person you want to fight.
We don't need to fight.
I'm not the one you're after, Gorro. I'm a soldier, not a pirate.
We don't need to fight.
You want to get your name out there, I get it. But coming after me isn't going to do that for you.
We don't need to fight.
Shut up!
I heard that all pirates are welcome here. You aren't exactly making me feel welcome.
[Pretend to be a pirate]
Good!
You're going to stop telling people these lies about me. Now.
Enough. [Draw Weapon]
Fine. I'll tell them how I killed you instead!
I can see where this is headed....
Okay... [Shoot First]
Ah!
